scripts.compile:html: rimraf html && swig render -j vars-html.json src/* -o html
scripts.compile:svg: rimraf svg && swig render -j vars-svg.json src/* -o svg
scripts.compile: npm run compile:html && npm run compile:svg
scripts.bundle:html: rollup -n hyperappHtml -f umd -i html/index.js -g hyperapp:hyperapp -o html/hyperappHtml.js
scripts.bundle:svg: rollup -n hyperappSvg -f umd -i svg/index.js -g hyperapp:hyperapp -o svg/hyperappSvg.js
scripts.build:html: npm run compile:html && npm run bundle:html && npm run minify:html
scripts.build:svg: npm run compile:svg && npm run bundle:svg && npm run minify:svg
scripts.build: npm run build:html && npm run build:svg
scripts.release: npm run build && npm test && git commit -am $npm_package_version && git tag $npm_package_version && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
